mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crosman, George H. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crosman, George H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 17 1861. By Telegraph from Philada 17 1861. Telegram recd two thousand 2000 forage caps were sent to Capt Craig Bellair Ohio Twelfth 12 inst will send balance as soon as possible GH Crosman Dept QM Genl 22G59pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crosman, George H.
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
